content.p: The FSSIDS 2022 Conference will be held at The Everly Hotel, Putrajaya. The Everly Hotel, Putrajaya offers 350 guest rooms overlooking the architecture and scenery of Putrajaya. It is conveniently located adjacent to a connecting Alamanda shopping mall. Disabled-friendly rooms are available upon request. Corporate rate for conference participants is available at RM 230 nett per night for a single/double room, inclusive of breakfast. Please contact us if you would like to take advantage of the corporate rate. Other accommodations nearby include Pulse Grande Hotel, Dorsett Putrajaya Hotel, Zenith Hotel Putrajaya, Enclave Hotel Putrajaya, Le Meridien Putrajaya, Palm Garden Hotel, and Putrajaya Marriott Hotel. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
